activities: We collect information from our users to help us understand how our app is being used, and to improve the user experience and the quality of features available through Amicus.  This information includes personally identifying information (first and last name, email address, zip code, and age) as well as non-identifiable information (server log data and information obtained through cookies) collected through App activity.  We collect this information when our users first create an account through the app.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect data automatically from our users when they create an account on our site.  This data includes first and last name, email address, zip code, and age.  If users use their Facebook profiles, we also access your public profile, friend list, email address, birthday, education history, groups, hometown, current city, photos and your friends' info.  Does not include manually processed data.
